content.question: The function of the allusion in line 4 might best be understood to convey

choices.label: that the lovers were oblivious to the world around them
a subtle shift from human love to spiritual love
that religion offers a quiet retreat from fiery passion
an extended description of a lurid dream

content.answer: that the lovers were oblivious to the world around them

skill.text: Skill 6.D: Identify and explain the function of an allusion.
